an3.130:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an3.130:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuruddho ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an3.130:1.3: “idhaham, avuso sariputta, dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena sahassam lokam olokemi.
an3.130:1.4: Araddham kho pana me viriyam asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggam.
an3.130:1.5: Atha ca pana me nanupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati”ti.
an3.130:2.1: “Yam kho te, avuso anuruddha, evam hoti:
an3.130:2.2: ‘aham dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena sahassam lokam volokemi’ti, idam te manasmim.
an3.130:2.3: Yampi te, avuso anuruddha, evam hoti:
an3.130:2.4: ‘araddham kho pana me viriyam asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggan’ti, idam te uddhaccasmim.
an3.130:2.5: Yampi te, avuso anuruddha, evam hoti:
an3.130:2.6: ‘atha ca pana me nanupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati’ti, idam te kukkuccasmim.
an3.130:2.7: Sadhu vatayasma anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahaya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritva amataya dhatuya cittam upasamharatu”ti.
an3.130:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho aparena samayena ime tayo dhamme pahaya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritva amataya dhatuya cittam upasamhari.
an3.130:3.2: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
an3.130:3.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
an3.130:3.4: Annataro ca panayasma anuruddho arahatam ahositi.
